channel.title: News on EnzymeML Project
channel.description: Recent content in News on EnzymeML Project

item.title: EnzymeML 1.0 released 2020-11-02
item.description: The specifications for EnzymeML 1.0 are now available from the Downloads page. Additionally, the EnzymeML team has already published two articles: Range, J., Halupczok, C., Lohmann, J., Swainston, N., Kettner, C., Bergmann, F.T., Weidemann, A., Wittig, U., Schnell, S. and Pleiss, J. (2022), EnzymeML—a data exchange format for biocatalysis and enzymology. FEBS J, 289: 5864-5874. https://doi.org/10.1111/febs.16318 Lauterbach S, Dienhart H, Range J, Malzacher S, Spöring JD, Rother D, Pinto MF, Martins P, Lagerman CE, Bommarius AS, Vang Høst A, Woodley JM, Ngubane S, Kudanga T, Bergmann FT, Rohwer JM, Iglezakis D, Weidemann A, Wittig U, Kettner C, Swainston N, Schnell S, Pleiss J.
